original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples, ‘Nobody brings a lamp into a house and puts it under a pot or under a bed. You do not do that. You put it up on a high place.
korean_text: 또 그들에게 이르시되 사람이 등불을 가져오는 것은 말 아래에나 평상 아래에 두려 함이냐 등경 위에 두려 함이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples
Nobody brings a lamp into a house
and puts it under a pot
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 솥 아래에 두지 않는다

sentences.original_text: You put it up on a high place
